phones.description: The iPhone 15 Pro comes with 6.1-inch OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Apple's improved A17 Pro processor. On the back there is a Triple camera setup with 48MP main camera.

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra comes with 6.8-nch Dynamic AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor. Specs also include 5000mAh battery and Quad camera setup on the back.

The Xiaomi 13 Ultra comes with 6.73-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor. Specs also include 5000mAh battery with 90W charging speed and Quad camera setup on the back.
The OnePlus 12 comes with 6.82-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor. Specs also include 5400mAh battery and Triple camera setup on the back.
